nhc_headline: ...PILAR DRIFTING TO THE NORTHEAST... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...PILAR DRIFTING TO THE NORTHEAST... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 7:00 PM CDT Tue Oct 31
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.7, -89.4
 with movement NE at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
